TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi CacheDependency extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: Establishes a dependency relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's object and a file, cache key, an array of either, or another object.

span.span: Establishes a dependency relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's object and a file, cache key, an array of either, or another object.

summary.span: The class monitors the dependency relationships so that when any of them changes, the cached item will be automatically removed.

span.span: The class monitors the dependency relationships so that when any of them changes, the cached item will be automatically removed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将项添加到缓存依赖于另一个对象，如文件或文件，数组的依赖项是自动从缓存中删除对象更改时。If you add an item to the cache that is dependent on another object, such as a file or array of files, the dependent item is automatically removed from the cache when the object changes. 例如，假设你创建根据 XML 文件中的数据的对象。For example, suppose you create a object based on data in an XML file. 你可以添加到缓存的使对象依赖于 XML 文件。You can add the to the cache with a object that makes the dependent on the XML file. 如果 XML 文件发生更改，从缓存中删除。If the XML file changes, the is removed from the cache. 可以将具有依赖项的项添加到你的应用程序的缓存和方法。You can add items with dependencies to your application's cache with the and methods. 不能使用属性将项添加到缓存的依赖关系。You cannot use the property to add items to the cache with dependencies. 若要设置依赖项，你创建的实例类，指定文件、 密钥或在其的项是依赖项，目录，然后将传递到的依赖关系或方法。To set up a dependency, you create an instance of the class, specifying the files, keys, or directories on which the item is dependent, and then pass the dependency to the or method. 实例可以表示单个文件或目录、 文件或目录的数组或文件或目录以及缓存键的数组的数组 (这些表示存储在其他项对象)。The instance can represent a single file or directory, an array of files or directories, or an array of files or directories along with an array of cache keys (these represent other items stored in the object). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定是否自上一个请求中的项以来更改。The following code example demonstrates using the property to determine whether a changed since the previous request for an item in the . `dt`传入值`start`参数设置为。The `dt` value passed in the `start` parameter is set to . [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged/CS/t.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged/VB/t.vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: When this resource changes, the cached object becomes obsolete and is removed from the cache.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors a file or directory for changes.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors a file or directory for changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目录或文件中指定`filename`参数找不到在文件系统中，则将视为丢失。If the directory or file specified in the `filename` parameter is not found in the file system, it will be treated as missing. 如果缺少目录或文件，则当与依赖项的对象将添加到，缓存的对象将不再从创建目录或文件时。If the directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when the directory or file is created. 例如，假定你将添加到对象并依赖于以下的文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果该文件未找到时对象创建，但更高版本创建，xyz.dat 文件在创建时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例并依赖于 XML 文件的类。The following code example creates an instance of the class with a dependency on an XML file. 方法然后将项添加到这是依赖于该文件。The method then adds an item to the that is dependent upon that file. [!code-csharp[Classic CacheDependency.CacheDependency Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CacheDependency.CacheDependency Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CacheDependency.CacheDependency Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CacheDependency.CacheDependency Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 你也可以使用以下方法添加一个项并依赖于一个文件。You can also use the following technique to add an item to the with a dependency on a file. [!code-csharp[Single File Dependency Cache entry#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Single File Dependency Cache entry/CS/DependencySingleFilecs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Single File Dependency Cache entry#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Single File Dependency Cache entry/VB/DependencySingleFilevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors an array of paths (to files or directories) for changes.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors an array of paths (to files or directories) for changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果文件或数组中的目录的任何更改或是来自该数组中删除缓存的项则成为过时记录并从应用程序的移除对象。If any of the files or directories in the array changes or is removed from the array, the cached item becomes obsolete and is removed from the application's object. 此外，如果任何目录或文件中指定`filenames`参数找不到在文件系统中，它将被视为丢失。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果缺少目录或文件，则当与依赖项的对象将添加到，缓存的对象将不再从创建该目录或文件时。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假定你将添加到对象并依赖于以下的文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果该文件未找到时对象创建，但更高版本创建，xyz.dat 文件在创建时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. > [!NOTE] > 在创建数组，其中包含的文件依赖关系时，你必须定义的文件数项添加到依赖于。When you create the array that contains the file dependencies, you must define the number of files that the item you are adding to the is dependent on. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将添加一个项有一组文件的依赖关系。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to add an item to the with dependencies on an array of files. 你还可以进行项取决于目录的数组。You can also make the item dependent on an array of directories. [!code-csharp[Multiple file based dependency#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Multiple file based dependency/CS/DependencyMultiFilecs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Multiple file based dependency#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Multiple file based dependency/VB/DependencyMultiFilevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目录或文件中指定`filename`参数找不到在文件系统中，则将视为丢失。If the directory or file specified in the `filename` parameter is not found in the file system, it will be treated as missing. 如果缺少目录或文件，则当与依赖项的对象将添加到，缓存的对象将不再从创建目录或文件时。If the directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when the directory or file is created. 例如，假定你将添加到对象并依赖于以下的文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果该文件未找到时对象创建，但更高版本创建，xyz.dat 文件在创建时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. > [!NOTE] > 更改跟踪将立即开始，并在不直接基于`start`参数。Change tracking begins immediately and is not directly based on the `start` parameter. 使用`start`参数来传递日期和时间在过去你想要检查的上次修改日期的目录或文件传递中对其`filename`参数。Use the `start` parameter to pass a date and time in the past against which you want to check the last modified date of the directory or file passed in the `filename` parameter. 如果的上次修改日期是否晚于日期和时间集传入`start`参数，该缓存的项移除从。If the last modified date is later than the date and time set passed in the `start` parameter, the cached item is removed from the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此构造函数来实例化对象，然后将一项插入具有此依赖项。The following code example uses this constructor to instantiate a object, then inserts an item into the with that dependency. `dt`传入值`start`参数设置为。The `dt` value passed in the `start` parameter is set to . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任何目录或文件中指定`filenames`参数找不到在文件系统中，它将被视为丢失。If any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果缺少目录或文件，则当与依赖项的对象将添加到，缓存的对象将不再从创建该目录或文件时。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假定你将添加到对象并依赖于以下的文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果该文件未找到时对象创建，但更高版本创建，xyz.dat 文件在创建时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. > [!NOTE] > 更改跟踪将立即开始，并在不直接基于`start`参数。Change tracking begins immediately and is not directly based on the `start` parameter. 使用`start`参数来传递日期和你要对其检查数组的上次修改的日期为过去时间传递中`filenames`参数。Use the `start` parameter to pass a date and time in the past against which you want to check the last modified date of the array passed in the `filenames` parameter. 如果的上次修改的数组中的任何对象的日期是否晚于日期和时间集传入`start`参数，该缓存的项移除从。If the last modified date of any object in the array is later than the date and time set passed in the `start` parameter, the cached item is removed from the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建传递两个 XML 文件的对象和一个值作为参数传递中包含对象时方法调用。The following code example creates a object that passes two XML files and a value when the object is included as a parameter argument in an method call. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外，如果任何目录或文件中指定`filenames`参数找不到在文件系统中，它将被视为丢失。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果缺少目录或文件，则当与依赖项的对象将添加到，缓存的对象将不再从创建该目录或文件时。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假定你将添加到对象并依赖于以下的文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果该文件未找到时对象创建，但更高版本创建，xyz.dat 文件在创建时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. 但是，`cachekeys`依赖项不起作用相同的方式。However, the `cachekeys` dependency does not work the same way. 如果中至少一个值`cachekeys`参数不存在的插入操作时，插入操作失败。If at least one value in the `cachekeys` parameter does not exist at the time of an insert, the insert fails. 请注意，对于此方案引发任何异常。Note that there is no exception thrown for this scenario. ## Examples 下面的代码段演示如何将项插入您的应用程序并依赖于另一个项的键放入缓存。The following code fragment demonstrates how to insert an item into your application's with a dependency on a key to another item placed in the cache. 由于此方法使用数组语法，你必须定义的键的数目在其上项要添加到依赖。Since this method uses array syntax, you must define the number of keys on which the item you are adding to the is dependent. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外，如果任何目录或文件中指定`filenames`参数找不到在文件系统中，它将被视为丢失。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果缺少目录或文件，则当与依赖项的对象将添加到，缓存的对象将不再从创建该目录或文件时。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假定你将添加到对象并依赖于以下的文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果该文件未找到时对象创建，但更高版本创建，xyz.dat 文件在创建时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. 但是，`cachekeys`依赖项不起作用相同的方式。However, the `cachekeys` dependency does not work the same way. 如果中至少一个值`cachekeys`参数不存在的插入操作时，插入操作失败。If at least one value in the `cachekeys` parameter does not exist at the time of an insert, the insert fails. 请注意，对于此方案引发任何异常。Note that there is no exception thrown for this scenario. > [!NOTE] > 更改跟踪将立即开始，并在不直接基于`start`参数。Change tracking begins immediately and is not directly based on the `start` parameter. 使用`start`参数来传递日期和你要对其检查任何对象的上次修改的日期为过去时间传递中`filenames`或`cachekeys`参数。Use the `start` parameter to pass a date and time in the past against which you want to check the last modified date of any object passed in the `filenames` or `cachekeys` parameters. 如果的上次修改的那些对象中的任何日期晚于日期且时间集传入`start`参数，该缓存的项移除从。If the last modified date of any of those objects is later than the date and time set passed in the `start` parameter, the cached item is removed from the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建`CreateDependency`方法。The following code example creates a `CreateDependency` method. 当调用此方法时，它将创建对象和属性用于将项添加到缓存中，与`key`参数`key1`和的值`Value 1`。When this method is called, it creates a object and the property is used to add an item to the cache with a `key` parameter of `key1` and a value of `Value 1`. 一个字符串，数组`dependencyKey`，然后使用的值创建`key1`以及。An array of strings, `dependencyKey`, is then created with the value of `key1` as well. 这构造函数，然后实例化传递对象的`dependencyKey`和对象作为参数自变量。This constructor then instantiates a object that passes `dependencyKey` and the object as parameter arguments. 方法使用接下来，调用对象作为参数。The method is called next, using the object as a parameter. 这使得该对象添加到缓存使用方法依赖于`key1`密钥。This makes the object added to the cache using the method dependent on the `key1` key. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外，如果任何目录或文件中指定`filenames`参数找不到在文件系统中，它将被视为丢失。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果缺少目录或文件，则当与依赖项的对象将添加到，缓存的对象将不再从创建该目录或文件时。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假定你将添加到对象并依赖于以下的文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果该文件未找到时对象创建，但更高版本创建，xyz.dat 文件在创建时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. 但是，`cachekeys`依赖项不起作用相同的方式。However, the `cachekeys` dependency does not work the same way. 如果中至少一个值`cachekeys`参数不存在的插入操作时，插入操作失败。If at least one value in the `cachekeys` parameter does not exist at the time of an insert, the insert fails. 请注意，对于此方案引发任何异常。Note that there is no exception thrown for this scenario. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建`CreateDependency`方法。The following code example creates a `CreateDependency` method. 当调用此方法时，它使用属性以将项添加到缓存中，与`key`参数`key1`和的值`Value 1`。When this method is called, it uses the property to add an item to the cache with a `key` parameter of `key1` and a value of `Value 1`. 一个字符串，数组`dependencyKey`，然后使用的值创建`key1`以及。An array of strings, `dependencyKey`, is then created with the value of `key1` as well. 构造函数用于创建对象， `dep1`，哪些传递`dependencyKey`作为参数传递。The constructor is used to create a object, `dep1`, which passes `dependencyKey` as a parameter argument. 第二个对象， `dep2`，使用此构造函数，创建`dep1`作为第三个参数自变量传递。A second object, `dep2`, is created using this constructor, with `dep1` passed as the third parameter argument. 此第二个依赖关系是依赖于第一个。This second dependency is dependent on the first. 方法使用第二个接下来，调用对象作为参数。The method is called next, using the second object as a parameter. 如果第一个依赖项以任何方式发生更改，缓存的项都将失效。If the first dependency changes in any way, the cached item will be invalidated. [!code-csharp[CacheDependency Constructor7#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheDependency Constructor7/CS/dependencycs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[CacheDependency Constructor7#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheDependency Constructor7/VB/dependencyvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外，如果任何目录或文件中指定`filenames`参数找不到在文件系统中，它将被视为丢失。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果缺少目录或文件，则当与依赖项的对象将添加到，缓存的对象将不再从创建该目录或文件时。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假定你将添加到对象并依赖于以下的文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果该文件未找到时对象创建，但更高版本创建，xyz.dat 文件在创建时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. 但是，`cachekeys`依赖项不起作用相同的方式。However, the `cachekeys` dependency does not work the same way. 如果中至少一个值`cachekeys`参数不存在的插入操作时，插入操作失败。If at least one value in the `cachekeys` parameter does not exist at the time of an insert, the insert fails. 请注意，对于此方案引发任何异常。Note that there is no exception thrown for this scenario. > [!NOTE] > 更改跟踪将立即开始，并在不直接基于`start`参数。Change tracking begins immediately and is not directly based on the `start` parameter. 使用`start`传递参数来传递日期和时间在过去依据你想要检查的任何对象的上次修改的日期`filenames`， `cachekeys`，或`dependency`参数。Use the `start` parameter to pass a date and time in the past against which you want to check the last modified date of any of the objects passed in the `filenames`, `cachekeys`, or `dependency` parameters. 如果的上次修改任何这些对象的日期是否晚于日期和时间传递中`start`参数，该缓存的项移除从。If the last modified date for any of those objects is later than the date and time passed in the `start` parameter, the cached item is removed from the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示`CreateDependency`方法。The following code example shows a `CreateDependency` method. 当调用此方法时，它将创建对象和属性用于将项添加到缓存的 key 参数为`key1`和的值`Value 1`。When this method is called, it creates a object and the property is used to add an item to the cache with a key parameter of `key1` and a value of `Value 1`. 一个字符串，数组`dependencyKey`，然后使用设置的值为其第一个 （并且只有一个） 索引处的值创建`key1`以及。An array of strings, `dependencyKey`, is then created with the value at its first (and only) index set to the value of `key1` as well. 构造函数之后用于创建对象， `dep1`，哪些传递`dependencyKey`作为参数传递。The constructor is then used to create a object, `dep1`, which passes `dependencyKey` as a parameter argument. 第二个对象， `dep2`，然后，与使用此构造函数，创建`dep1`和对象作为参数传递。A second object, `dep2`, is then created using this constructor, with `dep1` and the object passed as parameter arguments. 此第二个依赖关系将依赖于第一个，并且依赖监视将开始在 10 秒后`CreateDependency`调用方法。This second dependency is dependent on the first, and dependency monitoring will begin 10 seconds after the `CreateDependency` method is called. 方法使用第二个接下来，调用对象作为参数。The method is called next, using the second object as a parameter. 如果第一个依赖项以任何方式发生更改，缓存的项都将失效。If the first dependency changes in any way, the cached item will be invalidated. summary.span: Retrieves a unique identifier for a object.

span.span: The unique identifier for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会很适合用于跟踪的多个实例与某个项或应用程序相关联的类。This method can be particularly useful for tracking multiple instances of the class associated with an item or an application. 标识符是文件名 （针对文件依赖项） 或 （对于缓存键依赖关系） 项的名称和一个字符串，此方法将分配到的依赖项的组合。The identifier is a combination of either the file name (for a file dependency) or the key name (for a cache-key dependency) and a string that this method assigns to the dependency. 派生自的类中类，你可以重写此方法以自定义它如何生成的唯一标识符。In classes that derive from the class, you can override this method to customize how it generates the unique identifier. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建对象，名为`aggDep`，包含两个其数组中的对象。The following code example creates an object, named `aggDep`, with two objects in its array. 一次`aggDep`实例化时，该代码调用方法来生成两个依赖项的唯一标识符，`aggDep`包含和到包含页显示的标识符。Once `aggDep` is instantiated, the code calls the method to generate a unique identifier for both dependencies that `aggDep` contains and displays the identifiers to the containing page. 然后将项添加到，使用方法，与`aggDep`作为依赖项。An item is then added to the , using the method, with `aggDep` as a dependency. [!code-vb[CachingSamples_AggregateCacheDependency1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_AggregateCacheDependency1/VB/aggregatecachedependencysamplevb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将项添加到 ASP.NET 应用程序的与。You can add an item to an ASP.NET application's with a . 当发生更改，添加了项失效，并且从缓存中删除。When the changes, the item added to the is invalidated and removed from the cache. 你可以使用此属性以确定是否已更改，并重新创建中的项如果发生这种。You can use this property to determine whether a has changed, and recreate the item in the if that has occurred. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定是否自上一个请求中的项以来更改。The following code example demonstrates using the property to determine whether a changed since the previous request for an item in the . `dt`传入值`start`参数设置为。The `dt` value passed in the `start` parameter is set to . remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何派生自的类类必须实现此方法。Any class that derives from the class must implement this method. 派生自类，你可以使用任何方法或已在不重写的属性的基本功能。When you derive from the class, you use the base functionality of any method or property that you have not overridden. 在创建派生类的实例时，它表示文件、 缓存键、 数据库表或你想要使缓存的项取决于其他任意对象。When you create an instance of the derived class, it represents the files, cache keys, database tables, or other arbitrary objects that you want to make a cached item dependent upon. 当依赖项更改时，此方法通知的基本功能类项已更改，以便值和可以更新属性。When a dependency item changes, this method notifies the base functionality of the class that the item has changed, so that the values of the and properties can be updated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示从继承的类类。The following code example shows a class that inherits from the class. 它创建一个公共方法， `ResetDependency`，使用方法可以更改从该处修改依赖项的时间，然后调用方法。It creates a public method, `ResetDependency`, that uses the method to change the time at which the dependency was modified, and then calls the method. summary.span: Allows the first user to declare exclusive ownership of this dependency.

span.span: Allows the first user to declare exclusive ownership of this dependency.

returns.span: if the item was the first to take ownership otherwise .

span.span: if the item was the first to take ownership otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法声明使用依赖项。This method declares that the dependency is used. 如果另一个项之前调用此方法，并取得所有权，`false`返回。If another item previously called this method and took ownership, `false` is returned. A只能由一个缓存项。A can only be used by one cache entry. 当项目具有指定任何缓存依赖项添加到缓存时，缓存应该采取这些依赖关系，以确保，它们不会重新使用某处其他的所有权。When an item is added to a cache with any cache dependencies specified, the cache should take ownership of those dependencies to make sure that they are not reused somewhere else.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的单位以协调世界时 (UTC) （也称为格林威治标准时间）。This property is measured in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) (also known as Greenwich Mean Time). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用要添加的项，请使用两个类为对象依赖关系， 。The following code example uses the class to add an item, with two object dependencies, to the . 当请求项时，代码检查该项是否处于。When a request for the item is made, the code checks whether the item is in the . 如果是，属性是转换为字符串，页面上显示。If it is, the property is converted to a string and displayed on the page. 将该项目，其两个依赖项不是这样，如果会创建并添加到。If it is not, the item and its two dependencies are created and added to the . [!code-vb[CachingSamples_AggregateCacheDependency1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_AggregateCacheDependency1/VB/aggregatecachedependencysamplevb.aspx#2)]
